title: Power Platform & Business Systems Engineering
description:
Designing secure, scalable business systems using Microsoft Power Platform (Power Apps, Dataverse, Power Automate, Power Pages), fully integrated with Microsoft 365, Azure, and external APIs.

I architect solutions that replace spreadsheets, manual processes, and disconnected tools with governed, auditable, enterprise-ready platforms.

• Replace manual Excel-based processes
• Build auditable internal CRMs
• Create secure customer portals
• Automate approval workflows
• Improve reporting and operational visibility

title: AI & Intelligent Automation
description:
Implementing AI-driven automation using Azure AI Services, OpenAI/LLM integrations, Anthropic, Microsoft Copilot Studio, and RPA.

I help organizations reduce repetitive work, unlock data insights, and embed intelligent decision support directly into their operations.

• AI-assisted document processing
• AI-powered knowledge assistants
• Smart ticket classification
• LLM-driven business intelligence

title: Custom Application Development
description:
Architecting and developing tailored business applications, from internal systems and client portals to full operational platforms.

Using a hybrid low-code + full-code approach (React, Supabase, Azure, APIs), I deliver scalable, secure solutions aligned with your long-term growth strategy.

From discovery to deployment, I handle architecture, integrations, automation, and post-launch optimization, ensuring measurable business impact.

title: Solution Architecture & System Design
description:
Designing end-to-end solution architectures across Power Platform, Azure, and modern web technologies.

I provide high-level designs, data architecture, governance models, integration strategies, and cost optimization plans — ensuring systems are scalable, secure, and future-ready.

title: Automation & Integration Consulting
description:
Connecting systems and eliminating operational silos through API integrations, workflow automation, and data migration strategies.

I specialize in integrating legacy systems, third-party services, Microsoft ecosystem tools, and custom platforms into a unified digital backbone.
